body.p: You need to prepare yourself before attending a track day by ensuring that you are ready with the following things:

ul.li: A crash helmet that complies with the standard British Kite Mark 6658-85 Type A or A/FR or SA2000 (since superseded by SA2005 and SA2005-FIA8858).
Clothing that is overall of fire-proof type or is cotton-based; covers all body parts except the hands and face.

body.p: Note: Rolled-up sleeves are not allowed while on the circuit.
Important: Do not carry timing equipment on the track day.
